mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tag (tag_id, tag_name, t_article_id) VALUES (tag_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{tagName}, #{tArticleId})
mapper.select: SELECT ma.m_article_id "meetArticleId", ma.title, ma.content, t.tag_name, ma.regdate, ma.time FROM meet_article ma INNER JOIN tag_article ta ON ma.m_article_id = ta.t_article_id INNER JOIN tag t ON ta.t_article_id = t.t_article_id WHERE t.tag_name = #{value}
